name: AdvancedInstaller
description: Build setup packages using Advanced Installer.
author: Caphyon

inputs.name: advinstVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced Installer version to acquire. If no version is specified the latest will be used. If a local instance (manually installed and registered) is already present this step will be skipped. For a list of available versions please see [Advanced Installer version history](http://www.advancedinstaller.com/version-history.html)

inputs.name: advinstLicense
inputs.label: License Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced Installer license that will be used for registration.

inputs.name: aipPath
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repository root to the Advanced Installer project file (AIP).

inputs.name: aipBuild
inputs.label: Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced Installer project build to use, like DefaultBuild.

inputs.name: aipOutputFolder
inputs.label: Output Package Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The result package location. You can specify either an ansolute path or a pertial one, relative to the repository source.

inputs.name: aipExtraCommands
inputs.label: Command Line Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Additional Advanced Installer arguments passed along with the package build command.
Example: SetVersion 1.2.3
